title: No pbe for me?
body: I have played Lol for about 1 year and a half, and I signed up for PBE about 2 months after I began to play league. However, after all this time, I still haven't gotten picked for PBE. I know that I may seem childish, but can someone shine some light and maybe tell me if I will ever get chosen for PBE. Cause my friend who mains Ekko hot chosen for PBE a week after signing up.

replies.body: I know you've been patient and waiting a while, but we can't force through or expedite applications.  I don't have any information on how to get accepted beyond the PBE FAQ, aside from having an account in good standing.  Best of luck with your application
